doc.str: METHOD FOR DYEING OR BLEACHING THE HAIR

A method for dyeing or bleaching the hair by ejecting a mixed lotion (A3) composed of the first lotion (A1) and second lotion (A2) constituting a two-pack type hair-dyeing or -bleaching composition from a squeeze container (6) in the form of foam and applying the foam to the hair, wherein the squeeze container (6) comprises a container body (4) and a squeeze foamer (5). At least either of the first and second lotions (A1, A2) contains a foaming agent and the first and second lotions (A1, A2) are selected so as to give a mixed lotion exhibiting a viscosity (at 25°C) of 1 to 100mPa s. The first lotion (A1) is mixed with the second lotion (A2) in the container body (4) in such a way that no bubbling occurs and then the squeeze container (6) is squeezed in a standing state in order to inhibit the mixed lotion (A3) from reaching to an air suction passage (12) of the squeeze foamer (5). Thus, the mixed lotion composed of the first and second lotions constituting a two-pack type hair-dyeing or -bleaching composition can be ejected from the squeeze container stably in the form of fine foam.
